Rust + WebAssemblyæœ¬

æ¦‚è¦

å‚è€ƒæ›¸ç±ï¼šRustã¨WebAssemblyã«ã‚ˆã‚‹ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ é–‹ç™º(ç¬¬1ç‰ˆ)

ç›®çš„

ä¸Šè¨˜ã®å‚è€ƒæ›¸ç±ã«å¾“ã£ã¦ç’°å¢ƒæ§‹ç¯‰ã‚’ã—ã¦ã„ãŸã‚‰è©°ã¾ã£ãŸã®ã§ï¼Œè§£æ¶ˆæ–¹æ³•ã‚’å‚™å¿˜éŒ²çš„ãªãƒ¡ãƒ¢ã¨ã—ã¦è¨˜è¿°ã™ã‚‹ï¼

è¨­å®šã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã®æ³¨æ„ç‚¹

æ›¸ç±ã®è¨­å®š

ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®åˆæœŸåŒ–ï¼š

mkdir myProject
cd myProject
npm init rust-webpack

å®Ÿè¡Œï¼š

npm run start

æ›¸ç±ã«è¼‰ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç”Ÿã˜ãŸã®ã§ï¼Œæ›¸ç±ã®å¯¾å‡¦æ³•ã‚’å®Ÿæ–½ï¼š

curl https://rustwasm.github.io/wasm-pack/installer/init.sh -sSf | sh

ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã®å¯¾å‡¦ã¯æ¬¡ç¯€ã§è§£èª¬ã™ã‚‹ï¼

Rustã‚¨ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®æ›´æ–°ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ï¼Œæ¬¡ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«Cargo.tomlã‚’ç·¨é›†ã—ãŸï¼

# You must change these to your own details.
[package]
name = "rust-webpack-template"
description = "My super awesome Rust, WebAssembly, and Webpack project!"
version = "0.1.0"
authors = ["You <you@example.com>"]
categories = ["wasm"]
readme = "README.md"
edition = "2021"

[lib]
crate-type = ["cdylib"]

[profile.release]
# This makes the compiled code faster and smaller, but it makes compiling slower,
# so it's only enabled in release mode.
lto = true

[features]
# If you uncomment this line, it will enable `wee_alloc`:
#default = ["wee_alloc"]

[dependencies]
# The `wasm-bindgen` crate provides the bare minimum functionality needed
# to interact with JavaScript.
wasm-bindgen = "0.2.78"

# `wee_alloc` is a tiny allocator for wasm that is only ~1K in code size
# compared to the default allocator's ~10K. However, it is slower than the default
# allocator, so it's not enabled by default.
wee_alloc = { version = "0.4.2", optional = true }

# The `web-sys` crate allows you to interact with the various browser APIs,
# like the DOM.
[dependencies.web-sys]
version = "0.3.55"
features = ["console"]

# The `console_error_panic_hook` crate provides better debugging of panics by
# logging them with `console.error`. This is great for development, but requires
# all the `std::fmt` and `std::panicking` infrastructure, so it's only enabled
# in debug mode.
[target."cfg(debug_assertions)".dependencies]
console_error_panic_hook = "0.1.7"

# These crates are used for running unit tests.
[dev-dependencies]
wasm-bindgen-test = "0.3.28"
futures = "0.3.18"
js-sys = "0.3.55"
wasm-bindgen-futures = "0.4.28"

ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã¸ã®å¯¾å‡¦ï¼šnpmç’°å¢ƒæ•´ç†

npm run start

æ›¸ç±ã«å¾“ã£ã¦ä¸Šè¨˜ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã—ã¦ã‚‚ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ‘ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«å¤±æ•—ã™ã‚‹(2025/07/05ç¾åœ¨)ï¼ åŸå› ã¨ã—ã¦ã¯ï¼Œã¾ãšç§ã®ç’°å¢ƒã®å•é¡Œã§ã‚ã£ãŸï¼npmã ã‘ã§ã¯ä¸å®Œå…¨ã§ï¼Œnvmã«ã‚ˆã‚‹ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ç®¡ç†ã‚’ã—ã¦npmãªã©node.jsã‚’æœ€æ–°åŒ–ã—ã¦ä¿®å¾©ã—ãŸï¼

ã“ã‚Œã§nvmã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒå®Œäº†ã—ï¼Œnpmã®ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚‚ä¸ŠãŒã£ãŸï¼æ”¹ã‚ã¦ã€Œnpm install webpack@latestã€ã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œï¼

è„†å¼±æ€§ã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç”Ÿã˜ã¦ã„ãŸï¼š

ã“ã‚Œã¯ã€Œnpm audit fix â€“forceã€ã‚’è¡Œã£ã¦è§£æ¶ˆã—ãŸï¼(sudoã¯ä¸è¦ã®ã¯ãš)

ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã¸ã®å¯¾å‡¦ï¼špackage.jsonã®æ•´å‚™

æ¬¡ã«ã€Œnpm run startã€ã‚’è¡Œã†ã¨ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå¤‰åŒ–ã—ãŸï¼š

ã“ã‚Œã¯ã¾ãšï¼Œrun startã§ä½•ãŒèµ·ãã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ã‚’è¦‹ãªã„ã¨ã„ã‘ãªã„ï¼š

package.json

{
  "author": "You <you@example.com>",
  "name": "rust-webpack-template",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "rimraf dist pkg && webpack",
    "start": "rimraf dist pkg && webpack-dev-server --open -d source-map",
    "test": "cargo test && wasm-pack test --headless"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@wasm-tool/wasm-pack-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "copy-webpack-plugin": "^5.0.3",
    "rimraf": "^3.0.0",
    "webpack": "^5.99.8",
    "webpack-cli": "^6.0.1",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^5.2.1"
  },
  "description": "```sh npm install ```",
  "main": "webpack.config.js",
  "directories": {
    "test": "tests"
  },
  "license": "ISC"
}

ã“ã®startã®éƒ¨åˆ†ã§ï¼Œnpm run startã®ã¨ãã«å®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã®è©³ç´°ãŒæ›¸ã‹ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ï¼ å¤§æœ¬ã§ã¯ï¼Œã€Œâ€startâ€: â€œrimraf dist pkg && webpack-dev-server â€“open -dâ€ã€ã¨ãªã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šï¼Œ-dã®å¼•æ•°ã®å¾Œã«source-mapãŒç„¡ã„ãŸã‚ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‹ã‚‰æ¨æ¸¬ã§ãã‚‹ï¼ãªã®ã§è¿½åŠ ã—ãŸï¼ ã¾ãŸï¼Œwebpack.config.jsã«ã‚‚source-mapã®è¨˜è¿°ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ï¼

ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã¸ã®å¯¾å‡¦ï¼šwebpack.config.jsã®æ•´å‚™

æ¬¡ã«ç”Ÿã˜ãŸã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã¯ã“ã‚Œã§ã‚ã‚‹ï¼š

~/myProject$ npm run start

ã“ã®ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã®åŸå› ã¯ï¼Œwebpack-dev-serverã®latest-versionãŒv4ä»¥é™ã®å ´åˆï¼ŒcontentBaseã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãŒå‰Šé™¤ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‰ã§ã‚ã‚‹ï¼ sontentBaseã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ãŒï¼Œå‚è€ƒæ›¸ç±ã‚’åŸºã«é€²ã‚ã¦ã„ã£ãŸæ™‚ã®åˆæœŸçŠ¶æ…‹ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã¨æ¨æ¸¬ã—ã¦ï¼ŒcontentBaseã®ä»£æ›¿è¡¨ç¾ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸï¼ å‚è€ƒï¼šcontentBase

webpack.config.js

const path = require("path");
const CopyPlugin = require("copy-webpack-plugin");
const WasmPackPlugin = require("@wasm-tool/wasm-pack-plugin");
const { experiments } = require("webpack");

const dist = path.resolve(__dirname, "dist");

module.exports = {
  mode: "production",
  devtool: "source-map", // è¿½åŠ éƒ¨åˆ†
  entry: {
    index: "./js/index.js"
  },
  output: {
    path: dist,
    filename: "[name].js"
  },
  devServer: {
    static: {
      directory: path.join(__dirname, "dist"),  // è¿½åŠ ï¼šcontentBaseã®ä»£æ›¿è¡¨ç¾
    }
  },
  plugins: [
    new CopyPlugin([
      path.resolve(__dirname, "static")
    ]),

    new WasmPackPlugin({
      crateDirectory: __dirname,
    }),
  ]
};

Module parse failed: Unexpected character '' (1:0)
The module seem to be a WebAssembly module, but module is not flagged as WebAssembly module for webpack.
BREAKING CHANGE: Since webpack 5 WebAssembly is not enabled by default and flagged as experimental feature.
You need to enable one of the WebAssembly experiments via 'experiments.asyncWebAssembly: true' (based on async modules) or 'experiments.syncWebAssembly: true' (like webpack 4, deprecated).
For files that transpile to WebAssembly, make sure to set the module type in the 'module.rules' section of the config (e. g. 'type: "webassembly/async"').
